column2: Learning how to invest in stocks is not easy. But beginning investors can start with stock ratings, an easy routine and a lesson from Nvidia.
column4: How To Invest In Stocks In 2022: Start With Stock Ratings, A Routine — And One Simple Concept

column2: The worst-performing Dow Jones stocks this year include Walt Disney, Verizon, Boeing Amgen and Honeywell. Disney stock and Verizon saw double-digit percentage losses while the overall Dow Jones stock index finished up 18.
column4: 5 Worst Dow Jones Stocks Of 2021 Include Disney, Boeing
